mapper.sql: campaign_name, media, contact_point, campaign_id, start_date, end_date, cost, exposure_count, exposure_user_count, click_count, click_user_count, monthly_active_member_count, monthly_active_member_gmv, new_member_acquisition_count, new_member_acquisition_gmv, next_month_active_member_count, next_month_active_member_gmv, next_month_new_member_count, next_month_new_member_gmv
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from activity_media_slot_analysis
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into activity_media_slot_analysis (campaign_name, media, contact_point, campaign_id, start_date, end_date, cost, exposure_count, exposure_user_count, click_count, click_user_count, monthly_active_member_count, monthly_active_member_gmv, new_member_acquisition_count, new_member_acquisition_gmv, next_month_active_member_count, next_month_active_member_gmv, next_month_new_member_count, next_month_new_member_gmv) values (#{campaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{media,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{campaignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{exposureCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{exposureUserCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{clickCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{clickUserCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{monthlyActiveMemberCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{monthlyActiveMemberGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{newMemberAcquisitionCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{newMemberAcquisitionGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nextMonthActiveMemberCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nextMonthActiveMemberGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nextMonthNewMemberCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nextMonthNewMemberGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update activity_media_slot_analysis
campaign_name = #{record.campaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
media = #{record.media,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_point = #{record.contactPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
campaign_id = #{record.campaignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cost = #{record.cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
exposure_count = #{record.exposureCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
exposure_user_count = #{record.exposureUserCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
click_count = #{record.clickCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
click_user_count = #{record.clickUserCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
monthly_active_member_count = #{record.monthlyActiveMemberCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
monthly_active_member_gmv = #{record.monthlyActiveMemberGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
new_member_acquisition_count = #{record.newMemberAcquisitionCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
new_member_acquisition_gmv = #{record.newMemberAcquisitionGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
next_month_active_member_count = #{record.nextMonthActiveMemberCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
next_month_active_member_gmv = #{record.nextMonthActiveMemberGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
next_month_new_member_count = #{record.nextMonthNewMemberCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
next_month_new_member_gmv = #{record.nextMonthNewMemberGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update activity_media_slot_analysis set campaign_name = #{record.campaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, media = #{record.media,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_point = #{record.contactPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, campaign_id = #{record.campaignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cost = #{record.cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, exposure_count = #{record.exposureCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, exposure_user_count = #{record.exposureUserCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, click_count = #{record.clickCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, click_user_count = #{record.clickUserCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, monthly_active_member_count = #{record.monthlyActiveMemberCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, monthly_active_member_gmv = #{record.monthlyActiveMemberGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, new_member_acquisition_count = #{record.newMemberAcquisitionCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, new_member_acquisition_gmv = #{record.newMemberAcquisitionGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, next_month_active_member_count = #{record.nextMonthActiveMemberCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, next_month_active_member_gmv = #{record.nextMonthActiveMemberGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, next_month_new_member_count = #{record.nextMonthNewMemberCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, next_month_new_member_gmv = #{record.nextMonthNewMemberGmv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT contact_point FROM activity_media_slot_analysis GROUP BY contact_point;
SELECT media FROM activity_media_slot_analysis GROUP BY media;

select sum(${field}) as field ,media as media ,a.campaign_id as cid ,a.campaign_name as cname from activity_media_slot_analysis a where a.campaign_id in (#{cidA},#{cidB}) group by a.media,a.campaign_id order by a.campaign_id;

select sum(${field}) as field ,media as media ,a.contact_point as contactPoint ,a.campaign_id as cid ,a.campaign_name as cname from activity_media_slot_analysis a where a.campaign_id in (#{cidA},#{cidB}) group by a.media,a.campaign_id,a.contact_point order by a.campaign_id;

select
sum(a.cost) as field,
sum(a.exposure_count) as field,
sum(a.exposure_user_count) as field,
sum(a.click_count) as field,
sum(a.click_user_count) as field,
round(sum(a.cost/a.exposure_count)*1000,2) as field,
round(sum(a.cost/a.click_count),2) as field,
round(sum(a.click_count/a.exposure_count),2) as field,
sum(a.monthly_active_member_count) as field,
round(sum(a.monthly_active_member_gmv/a.cost),2) as field,
round(sum(a.monthly_active_member_gmv),2) as field,
round(sum(a.cost/a.monthly_active_member_count),2) as field,
round(sum(a.monthly_active_member_count/b.periodic_monthly_active_user_count),2) as field,
round(sum(a.monthly_active_member_gmv/b.periodic_monthly_active_user_gmv),2) as field,
sum(a.new_member_acquisition_count) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.new_member_acquisition_gmv/a.cost),2) as field,
sum(a.new_member_acquisition_gmv) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.cost/a.new_member_acquisition_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.new_member_acquisition_count/b.periodic_monthly_active_user_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.new_member_acquisition_gmv/b.periodic_monthly_active_user_gmv),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.monthly_active_member_gmv/a.monthly_active_member_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.next_month_active_member_gmv/a.next_month_active_member_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.new_member_acquisition_gmv/a.new_member_acquisition_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.next_month_new_member_gmv/a.next_month_new_member_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.next_month_active_member_count/a.monthly_active_member_count),2) as field,
ROUND(SUM(a.next_month_new_member_count/a.new_member_acquisition_count),2) AS field,
a.media as media, a.campaign_id as cid, a.campaign_name as cname, a.contact_point as contactPoint from activity_media_slot_analysis a left join activity_analysis b on a.campaign_id=b.campaign_id where a.campaign_id in (#{cidA},#{cidB})
and a.media=#{media}
group by a.media,a.campaign_id,a.contact_point,a.contact_point

select
sum(a.cost) as field,
sum(a.exposure_count) as field,
sum(a.exposure_user_count) as field,
sum(a.click_count) as field,
sum(a.click_user_count) as field,
round(sum(a.cost/a.exposure_count)*1000,2) as field,
round(sum(a.cost/a.click_count),2) as field,
round(sum(a.click_count/a.exposure_count),2) as field,
sum(a.monthly_active_member_count) as field,
round(sum(a.monthly_active_member_gmv/a.cost),2) as field,
round(sum(a.monthly_active_member_gmv),2) as field,
round(sum(a.cost/a.monthly_active_member_count),2) as field,
round(sum(a.monthly_active_member_count/b.periodic_monthly_active_user_count),2) as field,
round(sum(a.monthly_active_member_gmv/b.periodic_monthly_active_user_gmv),2) as field,
sum(a.new_member_acquisition_count) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.new_member_acquisition_gmv/a.cost),2) as field,
sum(a.new_member_acquisition_gmv) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.cost/a.new_member_acquisition_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.new_member_acquisition_count/b.periodic_monthly_active_user_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.new_member_acquisition_gmv/b.periodic_monthly_active_user_gmv),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.monthly_active_member_gmv/a.monthly_active_member_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.next_month_active_member_gmv/a.next_month_active_member_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.new_member_acquisition_gmv/a.new_member_acquisition_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.next_month_new_member_gmv/a.next_month_new_member_count),2) as field,
ROUND(sum(a.next_month_active_member_count/a.monthly_active_member_count),2) as field,
ROUND(SUM(a.next_month_new_member_count/a.new_member_acquisition_count),2) AS field,
a.media as media, a.campaign_id as cid, a.campaign_name as cname from activity_media_slot_analysis a left join activity_analysis b on a.campaign_id=b.campaign_id where a.campaign_id in (#{cidA},#{cidB}) group by a.media,a.campaign_id
